hr_web_service module¶

hr_web_service.all_measurements(user_email)¶

Function that prints the entire record of a user, given email.

hr_web_service.get_complete_average(user_email)¶

Function that calculates the average of all heart rates

hr_web_service.hello()¶

Function that greets the user on the main page!

hr_web_service.interval_avg()¶

Function that calculates the average heart rate from an interval.

Raises:
  • ValueError – Error raised if incorrect json format
  • TypeError – Error raised if inputs are of incorrect type
hr_web_service.store_heart_rate()¶

Function that takes in a json and creates or adds data to a user.

Raises:
  • ValueError – Error raised for incorrect json format
  • TypeError – Error raised if values provided are incorrect type
